description: Star's house was robbed, her whole life turned upside down and her family jewelry stolen. She combs the pawn shops and jewelry stores but no one has seen her prized family heirloom. Desperate she turns to the more shady stores, the ones that she knows turn stolen goods for profit. And sure enough the lying clerk has her necklace. If only he had given up, been honest and struck a deal she would not have had to punish him with her cock. The slimy shop boy gets the seduction of a life time when he messes with Star and her southern charms.
title: Pawn Shop Liar: How to Catch a Crook
